name: Races of Thalrathis
description: Thalrathis is home to a diverse array of races, each with its own history, traits, and strengths. From the nature-bound Forest Elves to the mystical Moon Elves, and the fierce Ogres, every race offers a unique way to experience the world. In this section, we delve into their origins, abilities, and culturesâ€”essential knowledge for any adventurer seeking to understand the peoples of Thalrathis.
